system.descriptionText:
Master and Commander of their vessel, wielder of their warrants of trade and oft  beholden to a dynasty ancient beyond reckoning.
Skills: Command, Commerce, Charm, Common Lore (Imperium), Evaluate, Literacy, Scholastic Lore (Astromancy), Speak Language (High Gothic, Low Gothic)
Talents: Air of Authority, Pistol Weapon Training (Universal), Melee Weapon Training (Universal)
Gear: Best Laspisol/Good Hand Cannon/Common Plasma Pistol. Best Mono-sword/Common Power Sword. Micro-Bead, Void Suit, Fine Clothing, Xeno-pelt Cloak, Best Light/Storm Trooper Carapace.
Special Ability: Exceptional Leader: As a free action once per round, the Rogue Trader may grant an ally that they can see who can hear them +10 to any one test, can't use ability on themselves.
